meanings.definition: A shoe worn over another shoe for protection or warmth.
meanings.sent1: I wore my overshoes to keep my feet dry in the rain.
meanings.sent2: She put on her overshoes before going out in the snow.
meanings.sent3: The overshoes made my feet look like they were wearing little raincoats.
meanings.sent4: His overshoes were like shields, protecting his shoes from the muddy ground.
meanings.sent5: The bright yellow overshoes stood out against the white snow.

meanings.definition: To cover or protect with an overshoe.
meanings.sent1: I overshoed my shoes to keep them clean during the hike.
meanings.sent2: She overshoes her favorite boots to preserve them for longer.
meanings.sent3: He overshoes everything he owns, even his slippers!
meanings.sent4: The gardener overshoed his work boots to avoid tracking dirt inside.
meanings.sent5: The children overshoed their sneakers with plastic bags to play in the mud.
